body: A snakeskin tunic is a tight, form-fitting shirt crafted from the scales of a giant snake. When worn, it grants a +1 armor bonus to AC, a +2 enhancement bonus to Dexterity, and a +2 resistance bonus on saving throws against poison.
name: Snakeskin Tunic
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Chest/Chest Slot Wondrous Items/Snakeskin Tunic
